participant_1.background:
I want to inspire people with my webcomic and music.
i am funny.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.
I loved reading books to my younger siblings, and we would all pretend to be the characters in the story.
i love to swim , and began at a young age.

participant_2.background:
I once got to see System of a Down live in concert, and it was one of the best experiences of my life.
i collect stamps.
I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants.
i volunteer in my spare time.
the kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.

content.text: It's going well, thanks for asking! How's yours?
It's going great! I'm just working on some webcomics and listening to music.
That sounds like fun! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into rock and metal right now.
Nice! I love System of a Down. They're one of my favorite bands.
Me too! I saw them live a few years ago and it was amazing.
I'm glad you like them too! What kind of hobbies do you have?
I volunteer in my spare time and I collect stamps.
That's really cool! I've never been a stamp collector, but I think it's a really interesting hobby.
Thanks! I've been collecting stamps since I was a kid.
Nice! What's the coolest stamp you have?
I have a stamp from the 1800s that's really cool. It's a picture of a ship.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to see it sometime.
Sure! I'll bring it over next time we hang out.
